long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This AI displays a real-time history of the pages you've viewed in a side panel and manages your favorites. It also remembers your favorite notes.

All data is stored within the browser, ensuring complete privacy. The tool is free to use and does not require an account.

Note:

The AI does nothing.

Features:

* While the side panel is open, it keeps track of the pages you open and displays them as a list.
* You can mark pages as favorites by clicking a star icon.
* You can also write notes for your favorites.
* To unfavorite a page, click the star icon again. Note that you can't unfavorite a page if it has notes.
* A search function is included.
* The history can store up to 100 items.
* There is no limit to the number of favorites.
* The AI appears at the bottom of the screen.

Setup:

1. Install the tool.
2. Open the Chrome side panel.
3. In the side panel, select this tool.
That's it!
